description:
Making a mad dash for the Submerge with the food they stole, Luffy and the others have to get through some of the Navy`s upstart soldiers! Grount, whose arm holds incredible power, summons his training to challenge Luffy!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Akuma no Kobushi: Kessen! Luffy tai Grant
Des Teufels Faust! – Entscheidungskampf: Ruffy gegen Grount!
Le poing du démon. Confrontation ! Luffy vs. Grount !
The Devil`s Fist! A Show Down! Luffy vs. Grount!
Дьявольский кулак! Последняя битва: Луффи против Гранта!
قبضة الشيطان! مواجهة حاسمة! لوفي ضد غراونت!
悪魔の拳 決戦! ルフィVS[たい]グラント
